detail_desc: Scarves in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 30x80 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, waffle-knit cotton with a zip-up chest pocket in contrasting colour woven fabric. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cap in marled cotton jersey with elastication at the back.
Nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with soft lace trims. Non-wired padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short-sleeved tops in cotton jersey.
3/4-length pull-on trousers in an airy, patterned cotton weave with and elasticated waistband with a drawstring. Fake fly, side pockets, one back pocket and elasticated hems.
Velour jacket with a motif front and back and a lined hood, zip down the front, pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Padded ski mittens in windproof, water-repellent fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Reinforced palms, ribbing at the top and a Thinsulate™ lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Straight-cut, slightly shorter blouse in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Small stand-up collar, concealed buttons down the front and frills front and back. Long sleeves with a seam and flounce at the cuffs.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit. Regular waist, slightly lower crotch, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Lace body with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck and fastening at the crotch.
Pyjama bottoms in cotton flannel with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and tapered legs.
Cropped, boxy-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline.
Baby Exclusive. Hat in soft, rib-knit wool.
Bikini top with lightly padded, triangular cups, transparent sections and narrow ties that can be fastened in various ways. No fastening at the back.
Slingbacks with pointed toes, satin linings and imitation leather insoles.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Wide pyjama bottoms in silk. Elasticated waist, straight-cut legs and a seam at the hem with piping in a contrasting colour.
Block-coloured T-shirt in soft cotton piqué with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Shirt in a textured cotton weave with a cutaway collar, classic front, and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Yoke at the back, a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Gently flared blouse in an airy weave containing glittery threads. Round neckline, a small opening with a button at the back of the neck, and double layered butterfly sleeves. Lined.

Trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, zipped side pockets, and back pockets with decorative seams. Tapered, shaped legs with seams at the knees.

Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit containing some wool. Zip at the back, dropped shoulders, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Tunic in airy chiffon with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, long batwing sleeves with a drawstring at the cuffs, and a seam at the waist with a drawstring at the sides. Partly lined.
Shorts in soft jersey made from a modal blend with a matt silk finish. Smocking and a drawstring at the waist and pockets in the side seams.
Knee-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Metal earrings with faceted plastic beads and sparkly stones. Length 5.5 cm.
Shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Wide, covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and raw-edge hems.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck body in jersey with a gentle sculpting effect on the waist. High-cut back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
5-pocket shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
T-shirts in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.

Boxy-style jumper in a soft, fluffy rib knit containing some wool. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves that taper at the cuffs and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Polo-neck jumper knitted in cotton with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Metal rings in various designs, one with a sparkly stone and four with plastic stones.
Dungaree shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a chest pocket, side and back pockets, buttons at the sides and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Trousers in soft, patterned viscose jersey with a regular, elasticated waist, slightly lower crotch, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs.
Soft slippers in imitation suede with a fold-down shaft that has a hook and loop fastening at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and tapered legs.
Rib-knit jumper in soft chenille yarn. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Cardigan in a soft fine knit with a lightly brushed finish, low dropped shoulders and side pockets. Ribbing at the opening, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a button-down collar, chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Set with a long-sleeved shirt, waistcoat, bow tie and pair of trousers. Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Waistcoat in a lightly brushed weave with buttons at the front and a back made from lining fabric. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back. Trousers in a lightly brushed weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and button, fake front pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Long, straight-style shirt in a cotton weave with short sleeves with wide buttoned cuff and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short velour top with a gathered front and long sleeves.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif and lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with a pleated stand-up collar that has a decorative knot detail at the front, an opening at the top and a concealed zip at the back. Long sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Dress in a floral-print crêpe weave with inset lace sections and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with a flounce, a seam at the waist and a concealed zip in the side. Lined skirt.
Top in slub cotton jersey with an interactive appliqué on the front, short cap sleeves, narrow ribbing around the neckline and short slits at the sides.

prod_name: Pat ls bd soft flannel solid
detail_desc: Shirt in soft cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Jersey sports top in a stretch cotton blend with taped details. Lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front, long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, a rounded hem and reflective details. Zipped pocket on one side and a high zip on the other. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
Short, sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a seam at the waist and concealed zip at one side. Unlined.
5-pocket, slim-fit, knee-length shorts in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and a print motif and appliqué.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Sports top in heavy jersey with taped details. Mesh-lined drawstring hood, short sleeves with ventilation holes under the arms, a kangaroo pocket, and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Double-layered hat in soft jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front.
Calf-length skirt in pleated jersey with an elasticated waist and a raw-edge, laser-cut hem.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit. Fleece lining.
Sleeveless top in soft, printed jersey with a gently flared, rounded hem.
Ankle boots with rounded toes, a zip in one side with a large ring, and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Gold-coloured necklace of rectangular metal links with a toggle clasp. Length approx. 44.5 cm.
Padded sleep mask with an elastic strap at the back. Polyester lining.
Leggings in stretch jersey with a denim look. Elasticated waist, zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Scarf in a soft rib knit.
Short, V-neck dress in an airy weave with flutter sleeves and gathered tiers to the hem for added volume. Unlined.
Sandals with adjustable hook and loop tabs at the top, a loop at the back and patterned soles.
Long T-shirt in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist. Unlined.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with embroidery and triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a soft, elasticated hem and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, darts at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist to create a fitted silhouette.
Wide metal bangle.
Long-sleeved tops in printed cotton jersey.
